ModelPKParam-client.name: _id
ModelPKParam-client.description: The desired **Client** record's primary key value

ModelPKParam-room.name: _id
ModelPKParam-room.description: The desired **Room** record's primary key value

ModelPKParam-apartment.name: _id
ModelPKParam-apartment.description: The desired **Apartment** record's primary key value

AttributeFilterParam.description: To filter results based on a particular attribute, specify a query parameter with the same name as the attribute defined on your model. For instance, if our `Purchase` model has an `amount` attribute, we could send `GET /purchase?amount=99.99` to return a list of $99.99 purchases.

WhereQueryParam.name: where
WhereQueryParam.description:
Instead of filtering based on a specific attribute, you may instead choose to provide a `where` parameter with the WHERE piece of a [Waterline criteria](https://sailsjs.com/documentation/concepts/models-and-orm/query-language), _encoded as a JSON string_. This allows you to take advantage of `contains`, `startsWith`, and other sub-attribute criteria modifiers for more powerful `find()` queries.

e.g. `?where={"name":{"contains":"theodore"}}`

LimitQueryParam.name: limit
LimitQueryParam.description: The maximum number of records to send back (useful for pagination). Defaults to 30.

SkipQueryParam.name: skip
SkipQueryParam.description: The number of records to skip (useful for pagination).

SortQueryParam.name: sort
SortQueryParam.description:
The sort order. By default, returned records are sorted by primary key value in ascending order.

e.g. `?sort=lastName%20ASC`

get.description:
Find a list of **Apartment** records that match the specified criteria.

(\*) Note that this is a [Sails blueprint shortcut route](https://sailsjs.com/documentation/concepts/blueprints/blueprint-routes#?shortcut-blueprint-routes) (recommended for **development-mode only**)

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: The attributes to include in the result, specified as a comma-delimited list. By default, all attributes are selected. Not valid for plural (‚Äúcollection‚Äù) association attributes.

parameters.name: omit
parameters.description: The attributes to exclude from the result, specified as a comma-delimited list. Cannot be used in conjuction with `select`. Not valid for plural (‚Äúcollection‚Äù) association attributes.

parameters.name: populate
parameters.description: If specified, overide the default automatic population process. Accepts a comma-separated list of attribute names for which to populate record values, or specify `false` to have no attributes populated.

200.description: Responds with a paged list of **Apartment** records that match the specified criteria

404.description: Resource not found

put.description: Replace all of the child records in one of this **Client** record's associations.

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: The name of the association

200.description: Responds with the newly updated **Client** record as a JSON dictionary

404.description: Cannot replace, **Client** record with specified ID **NOT** found

requestBody.description: The primary key values (usually IDs) of the child records to use as the new members of this collection

oneOf.description: **Client** record's foreign key values to use as the replacement for this collection (**room** association)

get.description: Populate and return foreign record(s) for the given association of this **Client** record.

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: The name of the association

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: The attributes to include in the result, specified as a comma-delimited list. By default, all attributes are selected. Not valid for plural (‚Äúcollection‚Äù) association attributes.

parameters.name: omit
parameters.description: The attributes to exclude from the result, specified as a comma-delimited list. Cannot be used in conjuction with `select`. Not valid for plural (‚Äúcollection‚Äù) association attributes.

200.description: Responds with the list of associated records as JSON dictionaries

404.description: Cannot populate, **Client** record with specified ID **NOT** found

get.description: Find a list of **Room** records that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: The attributes to include in the result, specified as a comma-delimited list. By default, all attributes are selected. Not valid for plural (‚Äúcollection‚Äù) association attributes.

parameters.name: omit
parameters.description: The attributes to exclude from the result, specified as a comma-delimited list. Cannot be used in conjuction with `select`. Not valid for plural (‚Äúcollection‚Äù) association attributes.

parameters.name: populate
parameters.description: If specified, overide the default automatic population process. Accepts a comma-separated list of attribute names for which to populate record values, or specify `false` to have no attributes populated.

200.description: Responds with a paged list of **Room** records that match the specified criteria

404.description: Resource not found

200.description: Success

oneOf.description: Room successfully added
Unauthorized access, missing or invalid authorization access
Internal server error from create room

400.description: Bad request, the room given does not exists.

404.description: Resource not found

requestBody.description: JSON dictionary representing the Room instance to create.

parameters.name: omit

parameters.name: populate
parameters.description: If specified, overide the default automatic population process. Accepts a comma-separated list of attribute names for which to populate record values, or specify `false` to have no attributes populated.
